column4: Anyone know how to get sound in CS:S with WINE, my problem is that i'm not getting sound through cat /dev/urandom > /dev/dsp ?
errr, do you get sound doing cat /dev/urandom > /dev/dsp?
none at all. and no errors
what about cat /dev/dsp ?
yes, i get sound from "cat /dev/dsp"
you get sound by doing cat /dev/dsp ???? wtf?
i mean i hear sound when i get that...
type*
weird, you should only get some output characters...
when i type that i hear beeping.
beep from the speaker in your internal computer?
also: sudo dd if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/dsp bs=1024 count=2 tells me it worked, but i dont hear anything.
no beep from my speaker.
what does lspci | grep audio says?
that should work with the emu2k1 module or something.
huh?
better ask in #alsa if that card is supported by them.
im sure it is
the card that i am using is audigy 2 zs. my sound is perfect all except in cs:s
is your mixer unmuted?
oh, better say that.
then is a wine configuration problem
you need to change something in ~/.wine/config, in the sound part. i don't use wine, so try in #winehq
they told me to get ALSAs OSS Emulater setup, and to test cat /dev/urandom > /dev/dsp - when i got sound from that, then to make sure i have OSS and Driver Emulater Checked in winecfg.
